<body>
    <img src="IMG-6746.jpg" alt="image" align="right" border="20px">
    <p class="content">
        <h4>Introduction:</h4>
        Hi there! my name is Priya. It is very comman Indian name which means beloved. I am from diversity rich country which is India. I came in Canada four years ago as an international student and now I am permanent residence. I designed this site to describe me. <br>
  
        <h4>About me</h4>
         I am the first in my family who started working at in early age and left home for higher studies. It was hard in the beginning but then I got a lot of life and work-related experiences. I learned cooking, living alone, self-care, team work, leadership and many more. I acquired the knowledge of self-confidence and hard work. Believe me, we can conquer anything in the world by using both these qualities in daily life. However, I like to play tennis, make mandolas, gun shooting, explore new places in the world, baking and shopping. I always post my travelling and food pictures on my <a href="https://www.instagram.com/priya.chandhar/"> Instagram </a>.  When I was in high school, I was very obsessed with blogs. I always wish I could make a website in which I can share my knowledge and discoveries with others.
  <br>
  
        <h4>Journey to become web developer</h4>
       I am passionate about technology and always try to keep myself updated with new gadgets. I took physics in high school, from where I learned more about the science behind tech. I always grab the knowledge of the mechanics behind every gadget which we use in daily life. Over time, I recognized the need for a platform that offers accessible and reliable tech insights to everyone, regardless of their background. Then one day, I was sitting in the breakroom at my work and attended a career program campaign, from where I got to know about <a href="https://www.correlation-one.com/">Correlation One</a>. I enrolled myself in the Software Development program in which I learned how to create my Website. So far, I have learned about, HTML and CSS, how to design a webpage, and how to add links, headings, paragraphs and images. I am still digging more for knowledge and hustle going on. 
    </p>
